{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = 108 Mbps Wireless PCI Adapter |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/WG311T |dl = http://support.netgear.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/747 |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Netgear |model = WG311T |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1h3 / v1h4 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = G108 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0013 |subvendor_id = 1385 |subdevice_id = 5a00 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PY3WG311TV3 |icid = 4054A-WG311TV3 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:14:6C,00:18:4D
|chip1 = Atheros;AR2414; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 108 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Cameo |manuf_model = WLG-1202 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/17/2004 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device is clearly a [[Cameo WLG-1202|'''Cameo''' WLG-1202]].
"NETGEAR" and "32-bit Wireless PCI Adapter Rev.A3" (as well as a large bit of FCC compliance text, some other stuff, the FCC ID, and the IC ID) is silkscreened on the board. A label on the back of the board identifies the device as a WG311T V1H4 (though it seems this device can also have a label identifying it as an WG311T V1H3 [http://www.netgear-forum.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=41251]).
==Links of Interest== [http://forum.ubuntuusers.de/topic/w-lan-verbindung-funktioniert-nach-einigen-sek/#post-3755992 PCI ID and OUI in this ubuntuusers.de thread] (presumably this device due to the 'AR2414 chip' ath5k message)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
